name: Squid Game - PS5 Controller UI [Mockup] ðŸŽ® (Community)
description:
When i saw the Squid Game masks Figma File from Alexander i couldn't help but think of how it would be amazing to have those as Playstation buttons on a custom PS5 controller.


That's when I added the "X" button which isnt part of the show but to fit the context. Then I found the PS5 controller mockup from Socrates and put it together the way i'd envision it.
